title: shasan
author: shasan
content: What happened:: Took a loan from me and scammed the loan. Never repaid never and never contacted with me.Scammers Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1016829Reference Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5030169.msg60971174#msg60971174Amount Scammed: 230$Payment Method: USDTProof of Payment: Here is the received acknowledgement post.PM/Chat Logs: Quote from: shasan on November 23, 2022, 03:38:24 AMI noticed you logged in to the forum a few days ago but not contacted me. If you cant contact me within 72 hours from me then I will create a scam accusation.Additional Notes: Though repayment should be paid by installment within the week, it is about 3 months, and still no repayment and also no contact with me. I have contacted him/her but there is no response and though I noticed s/he is coming online time to timeFlag: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3065

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Bummer, I see he's no longer active on the forum, so you probably won't get your money back. I mean, he logs in but he doesn't write and he isn't in signature campaigns any more.I'm going to leave him negative feedback for what it's worth. I remember some time ago he was in a controversy as he was tagged for questioninga casino's performance in a scam accusation thread or something like that I also remember that at some point he said he was quite broke, so the signature campaigns were good for him.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on December 16, 2022, 03:54:25 AMI'm going to leave him negative feedback for what it's worth. I remember some time ago he was in a controversy as he was tagged for questioninga casino's performance in a scam accusation thread or something like that I also remember that at some point he said he was quite broke, so the signature campaigns were good for him.I also remember he was a signature campaign participants, after the campaign end, he change his signature that has similar meaning like "signature campaign is for spammer or shitposter". When a new campaign comes up, he delete that signature and apply for a new campaign. Such kind user is liar and can't be trusted, now it's proven since the @OP got scammed by this user.I think @OP should increase the requirement for user that want to ask no collateral loan, receiving few merits doesn't prove he will care about his account, maybe the neutral tag make him insecure and think his account completely useless. I wouldn't surprised if he would join 1xbit scam campaign.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: Plaguedeath on December 16, 2022, 04:08:32 AMI wouldn't surprised if he would join 1xbit scam campaign.Well, in theory one of the requirements for joining the 1xBit campaigns is to have no negative feedback when applying, with the exception of negative feedback that has to do with them, but they have so few scruples that I wouldn't be surprised if they even break this very rule. Quote from: Plaguedeath on December 16, 2022, 04:08:32 AM maybe the neutral tag make him insecure and think his account completely useless. You mean the negative tag, I understand from the context. Neutral tags are earlier and have nothing to do with this.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on December 16, 2022, 05:32:49 AMQuote from: Plaguedeath on December 16, 2022, 04:08:32 AMI wouldn't surprised if he would join 1xbit scam campaign.Well, in theory one of the requirements for joining the 1xBit campaigns is to have no negative feedback when applying, with the exception of negative feedback that has to do with them, but they have so few scruples that I wouldn't be surprised if they even break this very rule.It baffles me when I see users getting their accounts destroyed over pittance as loans or when they enrol in obvious scam campaigns like the 1xbit stuff. What for? Now the same campaign is asking for accounts without red tags to join. It's an irony they don't want tagged accounts any more even when those accounts got tagged because they joined in their campaign.OP, you did well by calling that user out. I think I've seen one or two accounts with neutral tags for loans they've not repaid (I'm not sure it's from you though) even after several months they collected it. Scammers shouldn't be allowed to fester, otherwise they will ruin everything.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on December 16, 2022, 03:54:25 AMBummer, I see he's no longer active on the forum, so you probably won't get your money back. I mean, he logs in but he doesn't write and he isn't in signature campaigns any more.I find more worrying that he didn't contact the lender to find a proper solution to pay back his loan, especially as the negative feedback will deny him access to the signature campaigns.Unless the reason is war/problems with access and free time or some bad personal issues... I don't know... sorry shasan. I've supported the flag.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Supported the flag I understand we are in trying times I also have friends who I have been given a loan because of economic issues but they contact me to ask for more time but it seems edgycorner has no intention of requesting to ask for time, $230 is the amount of his account, there are campaigns that accept red trust on their campaign but I don't think this kind of tag and flag will be accepted in any campaign, sorry for your loss Buddy you will find a way to get that amount back in other ways.Don't lose trust on people who ask for your help, not all people are like him.

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Been going through some personal stuff.I will repay back the amount+interest+compensation for the delay in full by Jan 2023Sorry!

comments.author: shasan

comments.body: Quote from: edgycorner on December 16, 2022, 02:10:31 PMQuote from: edgycorner on December 16, 2022, 02:08:26 PMBeen going through some personal stuff.I will repay back the amount+interest+compensation for the delay in full by Jan 2023Sorry!I expect no understanding.I am really sorry for the delay.There are 15 days left until the beginning of the new year. It was a matter of your respect and appreciation to respond to his messages and tell him about your personal stuff. He waited for you for nearly 3 months. Anyway, Shasan is an understanding and trustworthy person. When You return the loan money to him, he will close the topic and remove the flag, but next time before you get a loan from another person, you must commit to paying it on time without any delay.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: edgycorner on December 16, 2022, 02:10:31 PMI expect no understanding.I am really sorry for the delay.You should have at least talked to him when things did not work out on your side, I believe shasan is someone who can listen and even give you some more time. It's sad that you had to ruin your account by going quiet, obviously members will think you are not to be trusted.Your account a rank would manage to repay that loan within a month if you have participated in signature campaigns, contests and reviews.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: I hope shasan gets their money back. The pain endured by the lender on having a borrower ghost them with an active non-collateral loan is only known by someone who has been a lender in the past. Good to see that the accused responded here, but I would keep my fingers crossed for now. Just because they responded now does not indicate they would pay back in time.Flag supported for now, if the accused pays back the loan + interest and compensation as declared by in this thread, I would withdraw my support of the flag.
